main

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.OdometryCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Thread
    Contains the methods responsible for correcting the odometer based on the inputs received by two color sensors.
    Author:
    Aimee Ascencio

        Correct a component of the odometer position to what is probably the nearest line.

      • correctAngle

        private boolean correctAngle(float slope)
        Correct the theta of the odometer, given that the error is not too large.
        Parameters:
        angle - The new angle to which we want to set odometer correction.
        Returns:
        true if the angle was corrected.

      • changedAngle

        private boolean changedAngle()
        Returns:
        true if the angle has changed more than the minimum turning angle.
